alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 11:34PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills of 30 to 35 degrees below zero expected through Sunday morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills of 20 to 30 degrees below zero expected. * WHERE...Livingston, Iroquois and Ford Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to noon CST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon Sunday to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
